meta.title: IN-FOMO | Terms of Service
meta.description: Review our terms of service to understand the conditions for using IN-FOMO's services and products.

hero.title: Terms of Service
hero.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our services.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: These Terms of Service ('Terms') govern your access to and use of IN-FOMO's website and services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the Terms, you may not access our services.

definitions.title: Definitions
definitions.content: For the purpose of these Terms:

items.0: 'Service' refers to the website operated by IN-FOMO
items.1: 'You' means the individual accessing or using the Service
items.3: 'Content' means any information, text, graphics, or other materials uploaded, downloaded, or appearing on the Service

account.title: User Accounts
account.content: When you create an account with us, you must provide accurate, complete, and current information. Failure to do so constitutes a breach of the Terms, which may result in immediate termination of your account.

items.0: You are responsible for safeguarding your account password
items.1: You agree not to disclose your password to any third party
items.2: You must notify us immediately upon becoming aware of any breach of security or unauthorized use of your account
items.3: You may not use another user's account without permission

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: The Service and its original content (excluding Content provided by users), features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of IN-FOMO and its licensors. The Service is protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws.

items.0: Our trademarks may not be used without our prior written permission
items.1: You retain ownership of your Content
items.2: By posting Content, you grant us a license to use, modify, and display that Content

restrictions.title: Prohibited Uses
restrictions.content: You may use our Service only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You agree not to use the Service:

items.0: In any way that violates any applicable law or regulation
items.1: To transmit any harmful or malicious code
items.2: To impersonate or attempt to impersonate the Company or others
items.3: To engage in any activity that interferes with or disrupts the Service
items.4: To attempt to gain unauthorized access to any portion of the Service

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including without limitation if you breach the Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the Service will immediately cease.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: IN-FOMO and its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.

warranty.title: Disclaimer
warranty.content: Your use of the Service is at your sole risk. The Service is provided 'AS IS' and 'AS AVAILABLE' without warranties of any kind, whether express or implied.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will try to provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at info@in-fomo.com.
